resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow FitpoloDemo use the storage permission
FitpoloDemo app need to record the data log and bracelet firmware update package , to feedback question and update firmware If this permission is not on, APP cannot be used normally.
After that, APP could search and connect with the bracelet
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow FitpoloDemo use the GPS permission
After that, APP could search and connect with the bracelet
